TAGLINE: Authentic Italian cuisine in the heart of downtown
DESCRIPTION: Family-owned restaurant serving traditional Italian dishes made with the finest imported ingredients
WEEKEND_HOURS: Fri-Sat: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Sun: 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Since 1985, Mario's Italian Kitchen has been serving authentic Italian cuisine to our community. Our family recipes have been passed down through generations, bringing you the true taste of Italy using only the finest imported ingredients and locally sourced produce.

google_maps.info: Get Google Maps embed code from maps.google.com -> Share -> Embed a map
